title: Bauhaus / rounded
content:
Helllo guys,

I've been asked to recreate this logo — granted it's not great, but I have to work with it nonetheless.

I've exhausted my resources to find the type, I'm assuming it'll be a DaFont special…if any of you can help I'd appreciate it.

Thanks for your time.

Font: 

 ITC Bauhaus 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072535/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [bauhaus.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072535/http:/typophile.com/files/bauhaus.png) | 455.98 KB |
author: paul_w

comments.content: As stated by the file title, [ITC Bauhaus](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072535/http:/myfonts.us/td-AKPlQe) Heavy, manually slanted (as there's no oblique/italic version available) and manually outlined twice.
